Description:
Under Contract
This immaculately presented townhouse is spacious, elegant, impressive throughout and is perfectly situated in the highly sought after Arena Estate.
This stunning 3 bedroom, one year young home is like new and has been thoughtfully designed.
Upon entering the home you are immediately captivated by the generous open plan living area with high ceilings and neutral colour pallet. The modern kitchen offers a large work surface, stainless steel appliances and overlooks the surprisingly roomy courtyard. Perfect for entertaining or just relaxing at the end of the day.
Upstairs you are greeted with a second bright and airy living area leading onto three well-proportioned bedrooms. All bedrooms are fitted with built in wardrobes and the master bedroom is accompanied with a full ensuite featuring an oversized shower. There is also a stunning family bathroom and separate toilet.
This property also features:
• Laundry, powder room and under stairs storage
• Reverse cycle air conditioning in the downstairs living area and master bedroom
• Electric panel heaters in all bedrooms and living areas
• Crimsafe security doors, flyscreens, tinted windows and double remote controlled garage with internal access
• NBN box and Ethernet wiring
• New home warranty.
Perfectly located close to schools, Cardinia train station is less than a 10-minute walk, buses, Monash Freeway, Princes Highway and the Arena Shopping Centre right on your doorstep.
This home offers secure living with low maintenance gardens - opportunities like this should not be missed!
Insights: 21 Curran Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New In Officer
Situated close to extensive parkland and wetlands in the sought after suburb of Officer is this executive style brand new double storey home. Set on a generous sized block of land the home features extensive open plan living areas including a lounge room, family/meals area and a rumpus room with split system air conditioning and direct access into the double garage. The kitchen is centrally located with a massive walk in pantry, caeser stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances including 900mm gas hotplates. The master bedroom is privately located upstairs with a luxuriously appointed ensuite and a large fitted walk in robe. The remaining 3 bedrooms are all downstairs and feature built in robes and are well serviced by the main bathroom. Fully fenced and landscaped, this home is well finished with timber laminate flooring to the living areas, gas ducted heating, downlights throughout, decking outside the rumpus room, rear access through the garage and much more. Close to public transport and walking distance to the new Caridnia Club this home is a must to inspect.
Insights: 33 Bridge Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
The highest of quality!
This home is immaculately presented and comprises of every extra inclusion you could imagine, a true credit to the intelligent effort of this Vendor with no compromise on quality.
Located in the number one growth corridor in Victoria and proudly presented for sale by Barry Plant Pakenham is 24 Saffron Avenue Officer that is sure to excite every buyer.
Positioned on the widest street in the Arcadia Estate, this home is walking distance to the following amenities; Cardinia Railway Station, Lakeside Square Town Centre, Officer Town Centre and the new prestigious Officer Club. The position offers further appeal by being walking distance to schools, childcare and medical centre, as well as being close to the M1 freeway.
Approaching this home you are greeted with a fully landscaped designer front garden with stylish features. The front façade will also not disappoint, offering a fully rendered appeal with feature stacked stone pillar and premium exposed aggregate driveway.
Security features are also paramount, with a mounted wireless camera with night vision and premium Bosch security system.
Starting with the basics, the home is a four bedroom two bathroom, (including ensuite) plus study nook layout, including an oversized living area/theatre room. Walk in robe to master and built in robes to other bedrooms
You can pick quality fittings and fixtures from a mile away, this home is no exception!
The home showcases beautiful prestigious bamboo flooring; premium porcelain floor tiles, designer curtains, 2740mm high ceilings and premium LED downlights with dimming capabilities in living, dining and study nook areas. Ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning with inverter technology are standard inclusions here.
Many would argue the kitchen is the meeting place of any home; this kitchen is definitely a place to meet with family every morning! You will find; gas cooking, oversized island benchtop/ breakfast bar with designer under mount kitchen sink, 900mm stainless steel appliances including the dishwasher, and an abundance of cupboard and storage space. Not to mention the 40mm Caesar stone bench tops in the kitchen and wet pantry which are also featured in the laundry
The excellent space efficient floor plan compliments family living and entertaining perfectly.
With the addition of an covered alfresco area flowing on from the family meals area. Entertaining will be a breeze. Find yourself able to create an ambient mood, with the fully wired speakers that are present throughout the home.
The home is also rated 6 stars for energy efficiency, featuring double glazed windows in selected rooms, recycled water connection to the property and mounted energy monitor in the living room with real time updates on household energy consumption.
Everything is impressive about this home, you’ll see it yourself the quality, effort, time and pleasure that has been taken into account when designing it. If you’d like to organise a private inspection contact Nicola today. This home will not disappoint, nor last long!
Insights: 24 Saffron Avenue, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality Living in Arena!
This Stunning Dennis Family built home is located in the ever popular Arena Estate and exudes luxury and class everywhere you look! Quietly tucked away within a private cul de sac the home is situated on a huge 673m2 block and will suit the fussiest of buyer who is looking for nothing to do but simply move in.
Features Include:
- 3 spacious bedrooms. Master with WIR, Full Ensuite with twin Vanities, toilet and shower plus a second bathroom servicing the remaining bedrooms
- Beautifully appointed kitchen with stone bench tops, full glass splash back, quality 900mm Stainless Steel appliances, Dishwasher and walk in pantry.
- 2 Separate internal living areas plus a huge outdoor alfresco area which will impress those looking to entertain!
- Other extras include Mitsubishi Split System A/C in both the Master Bedroom and main living area, Gas Ducted Heating, 9ft Ceilings, rear shed, oversized double lock up garage with rear roller door access.
- Walking distance to the Arena shopping Plaza, St Francis College and Heatherbrae Recreation reserve and only a short drive to Cardinia Train Station and Monash Freeway.
Primley positioned in the heart of one of Melbourne's highest growth corridors this home is sure to have all the boxes ticked and represents exceptional quality and value for money! INSPECT TODAY!!

Description:
Perfectly Presented & Positioned!!!
You will be suitably impressed with this perfectly positioned near new stunning home, at 80 Majestic Drive Officer. The home is sitting pretty on 400sqm parcel of land and invites you in with a two car remote garage with drive through access and internal access to the home, which encases three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite and the remaining two beds with built in robes. The kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances, is well positioned to entertain looking over the dining and living room, which leads to the side deck and fully fenced rear yard. The home offers comforts such as ducted heating, evaporative cooling and is positioned within walking distance to Arena Shopping Centre, new parkland, St Francis Xavier secondary, St Clare’s ELC and Primary, with close access to public transport, the new Club Officer and medical suites, this home has all you need!!

Description:
BRAND NEW BEAUTY!
Are you looking for a brand new home in an up and coming town like Officer? Well don’t bother buying land and waiting to build! This is the perfect opportunity to purchase a beautiful new home in The Rise estate and move in now!
This quality built home features 4 bedrooms, two living areas plus a rumpus/theatre room, master with ENS and WIR, high ceilings and alfresco entertaining. The kitchen will comprise stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops (also in laundry and bathrooms) and a large walk in pantry and walk in linen – with plenty of room for everything!
Gas heating and evaporative cooling will also be installed, along with double glazed windows – giving the home a 6 star energy rating. The double garage features a rear roller door with access through to the backyard.
Please call to arrange an inspection today.

Description:
Lakefront townhouse living at its finest
Set in one of the fastest growth corridors in the country with a huge amount of public infrastructure about to be built, this spotlessly presented, low maintenance townhouse is ideally positioned. Only a short walk to the new Cardinia train station, Arena and Lakeside Square Shopping centre and the new Club Officer, this quality built light filled home offers neutral toning's throughout and affords stunning views across acres of parks and wetlands incorporating walking tracks right outside your gate.
Whether entertaining indoors or out under the large, private decked pergola, leading directly off the kitchen and sheltered from the elements, the home is larger than you might think. Offering;
- 3 bedrooms with the master offering a full en-suite and WIR whilst a 2nd bathroom services the 2 remaining spacious bedrooms, each with built in robes.
- A fully appointed kitchen featuring stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances.
- A generous meals area and formal lounge, both offering views of the wetlands out front and a second smaller living area upstairs.
- A double remote garage with internal access.
Further add reverse cycle air conditioning units throughout, tiles in the traffic areas, quality window furnishings and established gardens, all only a 5 minute drive to the freeway and 45 minutes from the heart of Melbourne and this is a brilliant lifestyle property or investment in a growing market that should not be missed.
Prices are rising and properties are selling in days, so do not miss this outstanding buying opportunity.
Insights: 28 Rush Lily Drive, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Ready For You in Timbertop
Sale by Negotiation
This near-new home in the ever popular Timbertop Estate could be the opportunity to secure your future in what is sure to become one of Officer's most highly sought-after neighbourhoods. Offering a sensible single-level floorplan showcasing four bedrooms, the master at the front of the home with walk-in-robe and ensuite, as well as three separate living areas, we are sure this home will suit the modern family. At the centre of the home you'll find the well-appointed kitchen which features stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances and fronts on to the open-plan meals and family area, with a great sized living room to the side, which could comfortably be converted to a home theatre. The smart sized laundry offers ample space along with a cleverly placed powder room to service the main living zones. The third living area, which would function as a children's retreat or an additional area to entertain, is set privately towards the rear of the home alongside the three remaining bedrooms and family bathroom. Outside you'll discover the low-maintenance yard beyond the wonderful alfresco dining area with brand new decking, perfect for the morning coffee or dinner with friends. As one of the few opportunities that have arisen to secure an established home in the Timbertop Estate, we're sure this one won't last long. Currently leased on a month to month basis, and returning $1,825.00 pcm, be quick to call us to register your interest in the home.
Calum Dabb : 0400 273 535

Description:
*** SOLD by Robert Petelinek at AgentX Real Estate Berwick ***
Situated in the gorgeous & exclusive "Timbertop" Estate in Officer is this stunning & extremely well presented brand new family home with the works that is sure to impress!
If you have always wanted a new home but don't want to build, look no further... This home is complimented by:
* Four great sized bedrooms plus separate study nook. Large oversized master bedroom complete with large WIR's & private ensuite.
* Two separated & spacious living areas that includes separate rumpus/theatre room.
* AMAZING Kitchen complete with stone tops and top quality European 900mm stainless steel appliances, HUGE walk in pantry & dishwasher.
* Alfresco entertaining area
The home also includes fully landscaped gardens, double remote garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large laundry room with fit out, high ceilings and so much more...
The only thing left to do is move in. Ready now!
*** As might not be in your mapping or GPS, to find the property enter the Timbertop Estate, drive north up Timbertop Boulevard to the back of the estate, approach a curved section of the road and turn left. Then next left into Bowood Street then next left into Chiswick Street ***

Description:
FANTASTIC NEW FAMILY HOME OR INVESTMENT!
Be quick to secure this near new home in the heart of Officer (Arcadia Estate).
This charming (Burbank) residence provides a graceful floor plan containing wonderful formal and informal living spaces with impressive proportions. You will be greeted by a wide hall way leading to a formal lounge/study, followed by a generous master bedroom with walk in wardrobe and large en-suite, 2 other bedrooms with built in robes all within easy access to the main bathroom. The kitchen comes complete with stainless steel dishwasher, 900mm gas cooktop, oven and large pantry. While the main family room/meals area is open plan with sliding doors leading out to an undercover area for entertaining.
The property comes complete with ducted heating and cooling, and back garden for the children. Complimented by a double garage with secure internal access.
This home is in a prime location close to Officer Specialist and Officer Secondary School, Lakeside Primary School, Arena Shopping Village, Officer & Cardinia Road Train Stations.
Features Air Conditioning; Built-In Wardrobes; Formal Lounge; Double Block Out Blinds; Secure Parking; Covered Deck; Close to Schools; Close to Shops; Close to Transport.

Description:
Arena Estate Ex Display with total Class and Quality!
Exquisite is the only word to describe this incomparable Officer ex Display with all the class, quality and presence you would expect from a home of this calibre!
They say location is the key to finding the ultimate home for you and your family, well look no further as this property ticks all the boxes. Located virtually opposite the serene Arena estate parkland, close to schools, shops, public transport including the Cardinia Road train station, M1 access and both Officer and Pakenham town centres.
The property boasts four oversized bedrooms and a study! The luxurious master suite offers a huge walk in robe and ensuite with double vanities and double shower base. The three remaining bedrooms are located to the rear of the home, all with built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Need space? No problems the home presents every member of the family with their own area to enjoy including a formal living with gas log fire, family living area and theatre room!
The kitchen is the heart of the home with unsurpassed quality stainless steel appliances including built in microwave, dishwasher, oven and 900mm gas cook top.
Caesar stone waterfall benches and walk in pantry suffices the most serious of chef!
Like to entertain? The timber bi-fold doors lead you out to the mearbau decked pergola which is set up ready for all the summer bbq's and even has a gas log fire for the chilly winter nights!
Perfectly manicured landscaped gardens with faux turf makes for a relatively maintenance free backyard!
Nothing has been left to chance with, 9ft ceilings high quality carpet, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, walk in linen closet, extra wide double garage with remote roller door and an alarm what more could you ask for?
Call today as this one of a kind property won’t last long!

Description:
Greatness in Grandvue - Titled Land!
Sale by Negotiation
Located in the Grandvue Estate, on the north side of Officer, is this 448m2 (approx.) rectangular block. This block is titled and ready to build on, waiting for an astute buyer to take advantage of a premier location and what is sure to be fantastic neighbourhood to live in. Grandvue Estate is establishing fast and is already filling with quality homes, proving to be a popular destination. Grandvue provides great access to schools and shops, including St Francis Xavier College and the Arena Shopping Complex as well as convenient access to the Princes Highway, Cardinia Road Train Station and the Monash Freeway. Don't miss this opportunity to build your new home in this ideal location. Call now for further information.
Calum Dabb : 0400 273 535

Description:
All Class in Arena
Join the vibrant & ever popular Arena community and enjoy the convenience of being within close proximity to the new sporting ovals, Cardinia Road train station as well as supermarkets, speciality shops, parkland, and restaurants.
Oozing street appeal with a timeless facade, grandiose portico, luscious green lawns, and landscaped gardens, it is evident from the outset that this is a classy home. Once you open the front door you will be greeted with sophisticated, contemporary tonings throughout and a warm and inviting home that you will want to call yours!
Stepping onto the striking wood flooring and the tone has been set as you begin your journey through this immaculately presented four bedroom home. The master bedroom has an ensuite and walk in robe whilst the remaining bedrooms have built in robes and a serviced by a secondary bathroom.
The living areas are perfect for the growing family and include an open plan family and meals area plus adjoining rumpus room or home theatre room. The kitchen is not only visually appealing, but will tick the box of every master chef with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and a butlerâ??s pantry, perfect to tuck away all of those extra appliances. Other features of this amazing home include ducted heating, 9ft ceilings, split system air conditioner, plantation shutters plus much more.
Outside an undercover entertaining area makes the ideal setting for guests to enjoy and is surrounded by landscaped gardens and a lawn area. A large double garage has internal access to the home, remote control door, rear roller door as well as roof access for additional storage. An inspection is highly recommended as this home has so much to offer its new owner.

Description:
A Great Deal for a Smart Buyer!
Along with an increase in popularity comes an increase in prices...so a word to the wise is buy now!!!!
The Officer postcode is in demand as it offers convenient transport links to the Cardinia Road Train Station, M1 Freeway as well as the area's newest schools and trendiest shopping, restaurants and cafes.
Only four years young this modern four bedroom home offers buyers the opportunity to snap up a property in this area of high demand at an affordable price.
There is a main living zone which incorporates family living and dining areas and a Chef's kitchen complete with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and 900mm freestanding oven and cooktop.
The master bedroom offers walk in robe and ensuite, while remaining bedrooms have built in robes. With neutral tones throughout added features include double remote garage with direct entry, ducted heating, split system air conditioner and fibre optics.
An undercover alfresco entertaining area caters for outdoor entertaining and the good sized 448m2 low maintenance yard offers scope to add your own finishing touches or additions.
This home is ready for a new owner now. So hurry to avoid disappointment!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.
